Dear Valued LegalZoom Customer,
Thank you for your recent inquiry. In regards to your question, LegalZoom's Living Will document covers advance healthcare directives such as the desire to be or not to be sustained on artificial life support in the event of a terminal illness, coma, or vegetative state. LegalZoom's Living Will packages also include a complimentary Healthcare Power of Attorney (when purchased together with the Living Will) that allows you to appoint a person to make medical decisions on your behalf when you are unable to.
With LegalZoom, you have the option of creating both a Living Will document and a Healthcare Power of Attorney, or either one for the same price of $39.
I have included a complimentary ?Estate Planning Guide? to help you become more familiar with LegalZoom's documents.
Please call us toll-free at (800) 962-7490 if we can be of further assistance. We look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team {!snippetVariable.lz_address}
